attributes.action: Allow prisoners to work and be trained in job prospects rather than doing nothing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are alot of prisoners in this country and as we all know, its floded. So lets make the prisoners work supervised just the way they are supervised at jails. i mean we are all humans, gave them an opportunity or hope.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with severl already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/prison-recycle/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
